## QuerySort.set() method

Set one or more values to sort the query.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
set(value: SortingInput[]): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | <code>SortingInput[]</code> | Array of objects describing the sorting. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`

the new length of the list of sortings.
